body_html:
Thanks @rryan for implementing the batched form of the FFT and IFFT. Sorry I have been gone for a while, but I had other responsibilities I had to take care of.

I am working both on Unitary RNN's now along with Associated LSTM's -- both of which require complex number calculations. If I can get either of them working, I'll submit a push to Tensorflow's rnn_cell.py

Right now though, it doesn't seem like backprop is supported for complex numbers and I have inquired about it #here:#2255

I am working both on Unitary RNN's now along with Associated LSTM's -- both of which require complex number calculations. If I can get either of them working, I'll submit a push to Tensorflow's rnn_cell.py
Right now though, it doesn't seem like backprop is supported for complex numbers and I have inquired about it  #here:#2255
body:
Thanks @rryan for implementing the batched form of the FFT and IFFT. Sorry I have been gone for a while, but I had other responsibilities I had to take care of.

I am working both on Unitary RNN's now along with Associated LSTM's -- both of which require complex number calculations. If I can get either of them working, I'll submit a push to Tensorflow's `rnn_cell.py`

Right now though, it doesn't seem like backprop is supported for complex numbers and I have inquired about it  #here:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/2255
